# OPDX Token and Mining Distribution

Smart contracts for the Opdex token and Mining distribution. Consists of three individual smart contracts, OPDX Token, Mining Governance, and a Mining Pool.
OPDX Token is deployed from the bytecode, Mining Governance is deployed during the creation of OPDX Token, and Mining Pools are created through the Mining 
Governance contract during liquidity pool nomination.

## OPDX Token

Builds on top of the existing IStandardToken256 interface. Adds distribution abilities on a per year (set in blocks) basis.
Yearly, the owner and mining governance addresses set have funds distributed. Calls to nominate a smart contract for liquidity mining 
are routed through this contract to an authorized method in the Mining Governance contract.

[Token Docs](/docs/OpdexTokenContract.md)

## Mining Governance

Deploys and funds 4 liquidity mining pools per month (set in blocks). Mining pools are chosen through a nomination process by OPDX staking weight. 
Every stake or unstake in an Opdex staking pool will automatically nominate itself for mining. The top 4 nominated pools by staking weight
at the end of each nomination period are funded with OPDX to mine.

[Mining Governance Docs](/docs/OpdexMiningGovernanceContract.md)

## Mining Pool

Individual liquidity mining per nominated liquidity pool. Deployed after a successful nomination so liquidity miners can get into position.
Notified of funding to activate liquidity mining after a the governance nomination period has ended and funds have been transferred. Stake
Opdex liquidity pool tokens through the one month (set in blocks) mining period to earn new OPDX tokens.

[Mining Pool Docs](/docs/OpdexMiningPoolContract.md)

## Compile

**Compiler Version**

```text
v2.0.0
```

**Hash**

```text
58a93af81b8ff9fc9af11f925fa2514f18e8cdac3813d7703920fa3f129eaa83
```

**Bytecode**

```text

```

## Deploy

Use the provided bytecode to deploy the token contract. The token contract deploys a mining governance contract. The mining 
governance contract deploys individual mining pools.

### Parameters

`byte[] ownerDistribution` - Serialized UInt256 array of owner distribution amounts.

`byte[] miningDistribution` - Serialized UInt256 array of mining distribution amounts.

`ulong periodDuration` - The amount of blocks between each distribution.
